arguments.name: blur
arguments.description: If set, the wallpaper must be downscaled to fit in 450x450 square and then box-blurred with radius 12

arguments.name: motion
arguments.description: If set, the background needs to be slightly moved when device is rotated

arguments.name: backgroundColor
arguments.description: If set, a PNG pattern is to be combined with the color chosen by the user: the main color of the background in RGB24 format

arguments.name: secondBackgroundColor
arguments.description: If set, a PNG pattern is to be combined with the first and second background colors (RGB24 format) in a top-bottom gradient

arguments.name: intensity
arguments.description: Intensity of the pattern when it is shown above the main background color, 0-100

arguments.name: rotation
arguments.description: Clockwise rotation angle of the gradient, in degrees; 0-359. Should be always divisible by 45
